content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: QNAM
      operator: is_contained_by
      value:
        - Model List of Allowed Variables for Observation Class
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0351
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when a variable in Model List of Allowed Variables for
  Observation Class is in SUPPQUAL
Outcome:
  Message: Variable within SUPPQUAL is in Model List of Allowed Variables for Observation
    Class
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Value
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0351
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Using SDTM-specified standard variable names
                Document: IG v3.2
                Item:
                Section: 3.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

all.name: QNAM
value: Model List of Allowed Variables for Observation Class

json.Description: Trigger error when a variable in Model List of Allowed Variables for Observation Class is in SUPPQUAL

Outcome.Message: Variable within SUPPQUAL is in Model List of Allowed Variables for Observation Class
